Also to do with the polling areas.
Essentanl reporting is EMC. who get it run out by uni kids and others in sydney and melb. The areas they poll don't stray to far from the uni's which are generally inner sydney further right leaning voters.
The other 50 percent of the polling is performed over phone satisfaction polling aggregates.
Who is home between 9am-4pm. Usually, older people who are retired that lean more conservative and never change their vote habits even if their member kicked a baby in the eye socket in front of them.
And stay at home parents who are generally more comfy. it's them and the jobless ppl who have time to conduct the poll that make up the swing to the left.
If you called the phones after dinner time you would probably see a larger swing to labor as all the working class ppl are home by then.

The Liberal National Party (LNP) Welfare Card programme is really a LNP rort for the benefit of the Liberal and National Parties and their members, donors and supporters.
